titleStmt.title: J. H. Howard et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2312

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Mt Eden Ky
Dec 18th 1865
To His Excellency Thomas E Bramlett
Govenor of Kentucky

We the citizens of this district No 4 Spencer Co are in need of a Magistrate in consequence of the death of our late Magistrate Andrew Mitchell, And hereby respectfully request that you appoint one to fill the vacan^cy^ occasioned thereby.
We respectfully recommend John McKinly as a gentleman qualified and suitable for the office

J, M, Harwood
M C Howard
Thos Crutcher
H. H. Cleveland
H. C. Terrell
W, S, Crutcher
Jesse Cooke
W H Harrison
V. Busby
E W Hedden
Charles Taylor
W P Martin
J. H, Cleveland
Jacob Snider
James L. Taylor
John Crafton
W S Moore
H C Brown
Stillwell Headden
J. J. Black
W H Browne
Thomas W. Heddy
Bradford Howser
B H Howser
Jas A Heady

Justice Peace
Spencer Co
John McKinley
apptd 22d Dec 1865
